name: Moms Simulator
description:
Have you ever thought about your mother’s daily routine? Our psychological Mother simulator is giving you a chance to feel yourself a virtual mother. You have a baby kid, which you have to bring up. Take care of your little baby and make everything for him, to make baby feel good. Clean him, feed and send him to bed. Reveal for yourself secret of a happy family in our new psychological mother simulator: Mom’s simulator. Do every household chore, which your mom usually do, Take care of your baby and make a happy family. Experience what it feels like to be a mom of a baby in our mother simulator. In this psychological game you have to do everything accurately, unless you want your baby to starve or feel bad, so gift your child a happy family and do everything in time to become the best mom in our new game.

In this psychological simulator of happy family, you will have to act like a real virtual mother. There are plenty of household chores, but your main target is to take care of your baby. In this mother simulator, you will have to watch your baby and feed him if he is hungry, clean him, entertain when he is crying and send him to bed when he is tired. It is important to do everything in time, as if you will be late you may lose your child. To keep a happy family in this psychological simulator, you should become the best mom ever. Being a virtual mother is hard job, so our mother simulator will show you how it really feels like. Make your family happy and prove them that their virtual mother can do everything. If you will do your chores correctly and accurately, your baby will appreciate it. That is what makes family happy.

Mom’s simulator is a free to play simulator of a virtual mother. Become the best mom for your baby and make him feel that he is in a good and kind family. Do your chores in time and do not lose your baby, or you will become a bad mom. When you are a virtual mother it is much easier to deal with everything, so download our psychological simulator and show the baby that he is in hands of professional mom!
